issue.title: [C++] Compile error with GCC 5.4.0
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7142](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7142). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If I recall correctly it was template related.

Reproduce it with:
export UBUNTU=16.04 
docker-compose build ubuntu-cpp
docker-compose run --rm ubuntu-cpp

cc `[~fsaintjacques]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7142?focusedCommentId=16974095) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5815
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5815>
